rows.label: qst202105_0010
rows.name: Ahh, finally some peace and quiet.

rows.label: qst202105_0020
rows.name:
Seriously...
I thought we were done for a moment there.

rows.label: qst202105_0030
rows.name: Hey, Shiki?

rows.label: qst202105_0040
rows.name:
...Uh, suddenly I'm more afraid
of her than those monsters...

rows.label: qst202105_0050
rows.name:
So, Shiki...
Will you be able to make use of this ancient wisdom?

rows.label: qst202105_0060
rows.name: This room is a like a witness to the ancients' sophistication.

rows.label: qst202105_0070
rows.name: There's all sorts of mind-blowing information stored here!

rows.label: qst202105_0080
rows.name:
It's a wondrous treasure trove of knowledge!
I'm so very, very glad we all came here!

rows.label: qst202105_0090
rows.name: A-ah, it's overwhelming. I might faint.

rows.label: qst202105_0100
rows.name:
Umm...
Anything we can use, like, right now?

rows.label: qst202105_0110
rows.name: Nope!

rows.label: qst202105_0120
rows.name: Nope?!

rows.label: qst202105_0130
rows.name: Deciphering the tomes...

rows.label: qst202105_0140
rows.name:
and then that tablet-like device as well?
All of that took considerable time as it is.

rows.label: qst202105_0150
rows.name:
But it was a Nopon child's play compared to the
stuff in here!

rows.label: qst202105_0160
rows.name: If I wanted to crack all of this...

rows.label: qst202105_0170
rows.name: It'd take a thousand years!

rows.label: qst202105_0180
rows.name: That...is a long time.

rows.label: qst202105_0190
rows.name:
All you Drivers would have to find a way to
stay alive for me for all that time!

rows.label: qst202105_0200
rows.name: Tora think that unlikely...

rows.label: qst202105_0210
rows.name:
*sigh*
Classic Shiki.

rows.label: qst202105_0220
rows.name: No kidding...
